title: Enclave Black taking applications for Coach
body:
Enclave Black is currently looking for a player coach to guide us through our preparation for open ladder and OCS qualification. 
The role of the coach would be to help the team improve by structuring practice sessions, providing feedback, and guiding the team through solutions to any problems that arise.

Desired qualifications:

- Extensive LoL game knowledge
- Strong organisational skills
- Ability to consistently and accurately convey information
- Prior coaching/analyst experience highly desired but not required
- Above 18 years of age also preferred

The correct candidate will attend all the teams scrim sessions which are 4 days a week for approximately 3-4 hours in the evening.
In the future or if proven needed other support staff can be appointed to help with replay analysis.

Email any applications to: 
charliewraith@outlook.com

Add: ECV Pinch ingame for any further questions

*Send all applications through email, not ingame*
